Edited March 19, 2015 by blackysun
filter system sucks and i found out why

Are you searching for your parts in career/science mode or sandbox?

In sandbox all parts should show no matter what. In career/science you might not have researched the corresponding tech node yet. Or worse; the part does not have a tech node assigned in the .cfg. A part without a tech node does not show in career/science mode, ever.
